name: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Chop the onion.
Heat a pan, sauté the chopped onion until translucent.
Push the onion to one side, scramble the eggs in the empty space until cooked.
Add the cooked rice to the pan, mixing well with the onion and eggs.
Stir-fry everything together for a few minutes until heated through.

name: Pork Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions and let it cool.
Finely chop the onion.
Whisk eggs in a bowl until blended.
Heat a pan, then add the chopped onion and sauté until softened.
Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir-fry for a few minutes.
Pour in the whisked eggs and stir-fry until cooked through and mixed well.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice until tender.
Chop onion.
Whisk eggs.
Heat a pan, cook onion until softened, then add whisked eggs and scramble.
Combine cooked rice with the egg and onion mixture, stirring until heated through.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl
steps: Chop the onion.
Rinse the rice thoroughly.
Sauté the chopped onion in a pan until softened.
Add the rinsed rice to the pan with the onion.
Pour in water and bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until all water is absorbed and the rice is tender.
Let the rice rest for a few minutes before serving.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Wash rice thoroughly under cold water.
Peel and finely chop the onion.
Combine washed rice and the appropriate amount of water in a pot.
Bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer until all water is absorbed and rice is tender.
Gently stir in the chopped onion just before serving.
